concept.title: TokenScript Step by Step
concept.shortdesc: In this guide we will explain step by step how you can create and use your own TokenScript.

conbody.p: We assume you have created a token on Ethereum or on an Ethereum Testnet. For testing purposes you can also use any existing token smart contract.
(2) Create the files by yourself: XML as the skeletton, JavaScript-files for Action Cards, CSS for style, Makefile as instruction how to make. Helpful: Ethereum Studio.
(1) We assume a very simple ERC token, and we assume you only want the wallet to receive a bit of information
(2) ABI to TokenScript. Understand the code: (a) xml (b) JavaScript
(3) Small edits: (a) Add Action Card (b) Write message, load picture
(4) Deploy: (a) Makefile (b) rename file (c ) copy on phone

(6) Outlook: Can do everything. For example, if you have something like cWBTC in AlphaWallet, you can deposit and withdraw cWTBC directly from the wallet. It is far from covering all compound functions, but a lot more than other wallets can do.
